message.body: After watching the clips you sent me I don't dislike the Cadillac as much haha
Yeah, it at least helps make the point that we're doing the 50's thing.
Should I make it black and white or do you want the red vests to show
I think I like it in color.
OK
Uploading latest version now. Will be ready in morning
So when you give the final approval how do you want me to give you a copy/ and how do you want to pay me?
I was wondering if I could mail you a check. I don't have any immediate plans to be in your area, so that would be the easiest way for me to pay you.
Yeah or does PayPal work for you?
Yeah, sure. We can do that. It's $110, right ($250 less the $140 I gave you)?
Yep
So do u have a YouTube account you want me to upload this too when were finished?
I don't have one, so if you can upload it, that would be cool.
Are you against making an account? I'd rather not put it on my personal account. I could possibly make another account though. Perhaps might make one for videos I make for others.
Sure, I can make an account. Either way works for me.
OK I'd rather just put it on yours
No problem.
Cool. Is there anything else you want to do with it on your end?
Not if you are happy with it
Yeah, I think it's good. I did the Paypal thing. Did you get it?
Yep got it. Thanks. Send me info for YouTube and I'll upload
OK I'll get to it when I get off work tonight
Cool, thanks.
Video uploaded. I didn't put a description or tags so you can edit them
Awesome. How do you want to be credited?
Never mind, I see you put your name in there.
What's my best option for getting hold of a physical copy? CD?
I could mail you a DVD if you like
how was the feedback?
So far it's all been positive.
I might want to shoot another video this summer, if you're available.
Great. team I'm definitely down to do more work just let me know

Cool. Also, something else to keep in mind, if you're up for going out on a weeknight, maybe next month, after one of our band practices, you can come out with us for some food and drinks (it will be on us).
Oh thanks. That's really nice. Yea I'm booked til mid may but after that that'd be cool.
Cool. I'll try and get that out soon. I'll put all the pics and videos on too?
Great, thanks.
